Comment: Law enforcement cooperation involves collaboration between different law enforcement agencies and organizations to achieve common goals, such as combating crime and enhancing public safety. This can include partnerships between local, state, and federal law enforcement agencies, as well as collaboration between law enforcement and private security agencies. Cooperation can take many forms, including information sharing, joint operations, and the exchange of personnel and resources.  https://www.google.com/search?q=law%20enforcement%20cooperation%20restrictions&client=firefox-b-1-m
